name: nimagen_to_gel_vcf_v1.0.0
title: App to convert sentieon dnaseq output VCF to GEL specified VCF
summary: VCF meeting GEL specification for WGS SNP genotyping

inputSpec.name: input_vcf
inputSpec.label: dnaseq_vcf
inputSpec.help: The ID of a sentieon output VCF file for GEL vcf conversion

inputSpec.name: input_vcf_index
inputSpec.label: vcf_index
inputSpec.help: The index file corresponding to the input VCF file

inputSpec.name: header_txt
inputSpec.label: header_txt
inputSpec.help: The correct header txt file to replace the original vcf header to match GEL specifications. Version of header must match version of snp nimagen assay
